name: Web Development
shorts: Become a Full-Stack Web Developer with just ONE course. HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, React, MongoDB, Web3 and DApps
overview: You will build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.
You will learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.
You will master both front and back-end development, becoming a full-stack developer by the end of the course.
After the course you will be able to build ANY website you want.

name: Graphics Design
shorts: The Ultimate Graphic Design Course Which Covers Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign,Design Theory, Branding and Logo Design
overview: Have a deep understanding of typography, color theory, photos, layout, blocking and other design theory and skills
Understand and learn the essential tools and capabilities of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign
Create logos and branding packages for potential clients
Learn photo editing and manipulation in Adobe Photoshop

name: App Development
shorts: Learn Android 12 App Development From Beginner to Advanced Developer. Build Apps like Trello, 7Min Workout, Weather App
overview: You can build any Android app you can think of. No matter if it is an idea that you or your friends have, or if it is a contract job that you need to develop.
You will build Apps for your portfolio to apply for jr. Android developer Jobs.
You'll be able to work as an Android freelancer and work from anywhere in the world.
Publish your apps on Google Play and generate revenue with Google Pay and Google Ads

name: Ethical Hacking
shorts: Become an ethical hacker that can hack computer systems like black hat hackers and secure them like security experts.
overview: 135+ ethical hacking & security videos.
Start from 0 up to a high-intermediate level.
Learn ethical hacking, its fields & the different types of hackers.
Install a hacking lab & needed software (on Windows, OS X and Linux).

name: Machine Learning
shorts: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts. Code templates included.
overview: Master Machine Learning on Python & R
Have a great intuition of many Machine Learning models
Make accurate predictions
Make powerful analysis

name: Data Science
shorts: Master Data Science & Machine Learning in Python: Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn, Machine Learning, and more!
overview: Gain familiarity with Pandas, a data analysis tool
Get a grasp on the theory behind basic and multiple linear regression
Tackle regression problems easily
Discover the logic behind decision trees
